author: PlayStation
description:

author: PlayStation
description:
Nodding Heads Games announces Raji: Kaliyuga, the sequel to Raji: An Ancient Epic, set six years later. The unsealing of the heavens by the asura warlord Mahabalasura escalates the conflict within the game to a cosmic level. This grand battle encompasses not only mortals but also gods, asuras, and mystical entities.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Raji: Kaliyuga - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012563

In the heart of a cursed jungle, faith and fear are your only weapons.
Face the unnameable, survive your allies’ madness and unearth what should have stayed buried. 
Inspired by Lovecraft’s haunting mythos, The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu blends cooperative survival, psychological horror, and exploration in a brutal test of trust and perception.

Can you tell what’s real when the jungle itself turns against you?

The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu will be available on PlayStation 5. Wishlist now!

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/tides-of-annihilation/

Experience the latest gameplay reveal for Tides of Annihilation, a single-player Arthurian knight fantasy action-adventure.

This new trailer takes the journey from London to the Otherworld, the realm of Avalon, where Gwendolyn joins forces with her former rival Lamorak to face a powerful foe within the mirrored domain, Tyronoe - one of the eight sisters of Morgan le Fay.

Developed by Eclipse Glow Games and inspired by Arthurian legends, Tides of Annihilation will launch on PlayStation.

Wishlist now!

🔗 https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/tides-of-annihilation/

#ps5 #ps5games #tidesofannihilation
title: Tides of Annihilation - Mirror Combat Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2467-CUSA16473_00-ASTRONEER0000000

In the ASTRONEER: Megatech DLC, players unlock the ability to build massive Megastructure projects that will test their Basebuilding skills using new and existing technology. Each Megastructure will have its own unique identity and gameplay, unlocking new possibilities and rewards. Harness the power of Megatech to take Basebuilding and Automation to a whole new level! This DLC will be completely compatible with existing saves, and builds off of any progress you’ve already made in game, feel free to start fresh, or load up your existing saves and start building!

In addition, this DLC will be released alongside a free update for all players. The free update will include new items and the ability to create a Megastructure that will allow automated interplanetary transportation. That means you will be able to move resources and technology between planets!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #astroneer
title: Astroneer - Megatech Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/overwatch/

You think you can outrun the wolf? That’s cute.

Introducing Vendetta - Overwatch’s first-ever melee Damage Hero! With her Palatine Fang greatsword in hand, along with her lightning-fast mobility, Vendetta dominates close-range encounters with raw power and unparalleled precision.

Dash in and demolish your foes using Whirlwind Dash, Soaring Slice, and Projected Edge, all while building attack and movement speed through her Onslaught passive. And when you’re ready to deliver the final blow, her Sundering Blade Ultimate deals severe damage to enemies directly in front of you.

Claim your vengeance as Vendetta during her limited-time Hero Trial Nov 26 - Dec 1, and see what the future holds for our newest Hero when she officially arrives in Season 20 on Dec 9.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #overwatch2
title: Overwatch 2 - Vendetta: New Hero Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015602/

Death Howl is a carefully crafted soulslike deck-builder, blending deep mechanics from both genres with a relatable narrative about grief and courage.

As Ro - a mother fighting to bring back her son - you descend into the spirit realm to face monstrous foes in grid-based, turn-based combat. Craft a deck tailored to your playstyle and explore an eerie world brought to life through stunning, minimalist pixel art.

Death Howl is coming to PlayStation 5 next year.

#ps5 #ps5games #deathhowl
title: Death Howl - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

The village of Kakamucho is under attack by the Shogun’s cat armies! Join Hank, a samurai dog in a world of cats, and his friends as they save the day, samurai-style. Slash, dash, and laugh your way through this wacky third-person action adventure, playable solo or in local co-op.

Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora™ – From the Ashes is an action-adventure expansion with ties to the new Avatar: Fire and Ash film.

author: PlayStation
description:
It's a Mercenary Day miracle! We’re making the first Bounty Pack for Borderlands 4 free for all players* via today’s patch!

Once you've updated, find and interact with the gift-wrapped present (marked on your map as a new mission) in any major hub, which will initiate the mission to assist Rush. 

And we’re just getting started: 
🎁We're adding a fifth Bounty Pack in 2026 for all owners of the Deluxe Edition, the Super Deluxe Edition, and the Bounty Pack Bundle
🎁A new takedown is in development to expand the endgame content, set to release later next year as a free update for all players
🎁The first Invincible boss, Bloomreaper, arrives this December, along with UVHM level 6

*How Rush Saved Mercenary Day is the first of five post-launch DLC Bounty Packs coming to Borderlands 4. How Rush Saved Mercenary Day is free for all players, while Bounty Packs 2, 3, 4, and 5 are included with Borderlands 4 Deluxe Edition, Borderlands 4 Super Deluxe Edition, the Borderlands 4 Bounty Pack Bundle,
title: Borderlands 4 - Bounty Pack 1: How Rush Saved Mercenary Day Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

Post-apocalyptic online vehicular combat game Crossout just received a “Forced Measure” major update that features an unlikely alliance of 2 factions: Engineers and Lunatics. This update brings brand new vehicle parts, including the new air cushion movement part, 2-mode machine gun, shotgun, crossbow and cabin. You're welcome to test these parts in the new "Test prototypes" brawl and, after that, dive into a new gameplay in the "Dangerous cargo" brawl!
